about_the_game:
Dear Steam user

My name is Odin. I come from the land of darkness and I want to take over the world. 3 days ago I tried to resurrect the undeath. Unfortunately, something went wrong because the skeletons don't have heads, can you help Me find their heads? When I rule the world, I will leave You alone.

Features

Help Odin bring the heads back to the undead. Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle.

- 60 levels
- Professional voice over ENG & PL
- You can help destroy the world
- Physics puzzle game
- Story (awesome voice acting)
- Steam Cloud
- Mouse, gamepad, keyboard
- Steam Achievements
- Halloween theme & cartoon style
- 29 languages supported + 1 Belarusian
- Linux/Windows/Mac
- All resolutions supported
detailed_description:
Dear Steam user

My name is Odin. I come from the land of darkness and I want to take over the world. 3 days ago I tried to resurrect the undeath. Unfortunately, something went wrong because the skeletons don't have heads, can you help Me find their heads? When I rule the world, I will leave You alone.

Features

Help Odin bring the heads back to the undead. Each level is a challenging physics-based puzzle.

- 60 levels
- Professional voice over ENG & PL
- You can help destroy the world
- Physics puzzle game
- Story (awesome voice acting)
- Steam Cloud
- Mouse, gamepad, keyboard
- Steam Achievements
- Halloween theme & cartoon style
- 29 languages supported + 1 Belarusian
- Linux/Windows/Mac
- All resolutions supported

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Additional Notes: Support all resolutions (21:9, ultrawide etc.)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.7
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Support all resolutions (21:9, ultrawide etc.)

name: Bro, where is my head??? Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 32/64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster 16
  • Additional Notes: Support all resolutions (21:9, ultrawide etc.)

short_description: My name is Odin. I come from the land of darkness and I want to take over the world. 3 days ago I tried to resurrect the undeath. Unfortunately, something went wrong because the skeletons don't have heads, can you help Me find their heads? When I rule the world, I will leave You alone.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
